${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:MagicWeaponPower.NAME: Magic Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b
attack(s) is/are #yMagic.

${modID}:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b
#yFocus.

${modID}:PowerUpPower.NAME: Powered Up
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, powers are free.

${modID}:KnowledgeIsPowerPower.NAME: Knowledge is Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw cards, gain #b
#yFocus this turn.

${modID}:StarstormPower.NAME: Starstorm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, deal #b
#yMagic damage to a random enemy #b
times.

${modID}:EidolonFormPower.NAME: Eidolon Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, put #b
card(s) from your draw pile into your hand and make them #ySpontaneous.

${modID}:MartialAdeptPower.NAME: Martial Adept
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, draw #b
card(s).

${modID}:GainFocusPower.NAME: Jailbroken
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b
#yFocus.

${modID}:GuidingLightPower.NAME: Guiding Light
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRetain up to #b
cards for each #yAether channeled.

${modID}:ArtilleryPower.NAME: Artillery
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, lose #b
hit points and add that many copies of Magic Missile to your hand.

${modID}:ArtilleryPower+.NAME: Artillery+
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, lose #b
hit points and add that many copies of Magic Missile+ to your hand.

${modID}:FireproofPower.NAME: Fireproof
DESCRIPTIONS: Take no damage from your own cards and orbs.

${modID}:EfficiencyPower.NAME: Efficiency
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the cost of #b
card(s) in your hand by one this combat.

${modID}:MaxHpIfRegenPower.NAME: Bio-Repair
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have any #yRegen at the end of combat, increase your max HP by #b

${modID}:LoseArtifactPower.NAME: Artifact Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b
#yArtifact.

${modID}:WardingPower.NAME: Warding
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b
#yArtifact and lose #b
#yArtifact at the start of your next turn.
